lines.text: One by one, you all made your way down into this mysterious tunnel and began to follow it as it curved to the left into shadow and into the mysterious continuation of this series of tunnels and chambers. So Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Burst of flame and you hear the sizzling of whatever fiendish flesh was left behind in that small puddle. It boils into this like black thick tar-like substance is left behind after the flame dies down into a slow--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool, that's Caleb's turn. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move forward as well towards--

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: She's wounded! I think I hit her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: You hear them, like an echo behind you in the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go charging back as Jester's walking by with this large-- her bright pink colored handy haversack she had made is now just splattered with like thick purple blood.

lines.text: I think Yarnball will really like it.

lines.text: First off, make a perception check for me.

lines.text: Sitting there at the mouth of this--

lines.text: You can make an arcana check if you'd like, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has the incubus attacked Caduceus. Did that put it in melee with Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus is not threatening it, so it wouldn't be considered in melee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But because I'm so hidden, no, that doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trigger you're waiting for is somebody to get into melee, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I didn't know if I hid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're waiting for somebody to get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although seeing it hit me wouldn't trigger, oh, no, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you consider it getting next to Caduceus, waiting for it to get closer to a friend?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was waiting for it to get within a position where I could sneak attack, which, so far, has been any time it's been engaged with one of my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can sneak attack because it does not know you're there because you were hidden from it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get advantage, but not sneak attack damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having it next to a friend is only useful if you do not have advantage on the strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would have had advantage anyway because of the last time it got hit was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no, he hasn't rolled advantage yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you see it rush past the friend, you fire, and the bolt strikes towards it and detonates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as portions of the incubus are scattered across the ceiling, the walls, the floors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You celebrate like, "Yeah!" And all you see is like the body of Caduceus, which is thrown about five or six feet from the explosion land on the ground, charred and dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a third level left because I have my Pearl of fucking Power!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and you pull out the diamond that you thankfully--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a thing she has to roll for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward, pull out the diamond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I place the diamond on his chest and I cast Revivify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice in your ear, a familiar voice says, "I'm proud of you." "(gasps)"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I even at one hit point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it over? Oh, that doesn't feel good, oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll never believe what I saw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was looking over you and smiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is, I'm going to sleep-- that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He should probably sleep. He needs some rest, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I got something left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit up and start Prayer of Healing for everybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the way out, so we're not--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to be 15 points for everybody, but it's going to take a few minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Staggers towards the body of the fuckboy fellow and I'm going to loot the shit out of that pile of meat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, this one. I'm going to see if there's anything on this fucking thing, covered in gore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go to the succubus or whatever one over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for like a small pouch, where you see contains 20 pieces of platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, you manage to rummage and pull it out of a small case that's attached to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe, what languages do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do-- actually, no, you don't recognize this at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a language and there's some small sketches and schematics on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, roll investigation check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a four. I was mostly looking for his wrist things, anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I put it on, does it seem to shrink down to my hand size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you put it on, no, it's floppy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are really big, but they have lightning in them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The thickness of the hide, you're not quite sure what the nature of the construction of them are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, do you want to put these in the bag of holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If bet you sat down and really thought about them a bunch, they might change.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have the ability to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They go in the bag of holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should put the big ugly heart in the bag of holding, too, so we can show it for evidence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to take his head?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His head is bigger than his heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't mind sawing it off right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just chop his head off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll help like grab the horns and position it so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head in its own right weighs, I'd say, close to like 300 pounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just do one of those rubbings. Just do a rubbing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can tell them where to find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we just bring the heart with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because, you know, what are they going to do? They're going to stay down here, we closed the rift.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From the body of the incubus, Caleb would see the succubus that got curb stomped by Beauregard, so I'm going to rifle its body. Oh, you did that already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys have already looked through all them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably rest, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We closed the rift, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder what time it is. What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time right now? You'd guess, based on the middle of the night, when you guys traversed down here, rest in-between, I'd say it's probably close to dawn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can throw up the dome down here, if we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can sleep and then we'll go see Lady Oreos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, should we search the cave just for anything else that was dropped or any of the other markings that it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to look around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since we saw the little creatures scratching into the surface and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take in the view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose either investigation or perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it, the two of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about a good roll? There you go. 26.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) It's all coming back to us now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like it's a little bit exposed to glass or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to give it a little touch with your staff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should you make sure it's okay first? (pigeon coo)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have everyone pay attention to this for a moment, I think that might not be a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Want to try and identify it before we touch it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, is that a thing you can do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can. It'll take some time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we can wait ten minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's check it out before we touch this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're picking it up and handling it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I will sit down next to it and draw a circle around it and start to attempt to identify it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep you up with Resistance, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we blow some of the dirt off of it, See what it is? it's a little covered in dirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that this was probably the slow growing source of the various tears that have been happening in the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to maybe get 60 feet away from this thing, if everyone wants to stand back, and maybe hit it with some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shouldn't destroy it, we should take it to them and show it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have the ability to do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I can, at the very least--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wouldn't shatter it into a thousand pieces because then it's not proof anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain how to deactivate the enchantment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to put it in a--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It would just open up into nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you put a dimensional rift into a dimensional rift, the world ends, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you guys want to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can put it in the lead box, but I don't want to put it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it would be best if we just go and tell the lady about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means, creatures could find their way into your bag of holding and take the contents out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. If they can reach into your bag of holding, and then take what's in there out, yeah, that can totally happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody have Dispel Magic left? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless we rest, a long rest, I have nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got to long rest, we might as well just drop this off with Lady Olisa or whatever it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if we wake up and there's a bunch of new stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we put it in the bubble with us? Nothing can get in or out of the bubble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we just rest here for a while, I can Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you doing with the device and the gloves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's in the bag of holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's in the bag of holding, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to sit here for a little bit, do you mind if I like put them on and see what happens? Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to take a short rest to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you're doing your badass short rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's trying to attune. Yeah, she attuned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, Beau? What did they do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave her alone, let her read it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're taking a short rest, can you, during that-- No, I guess during that time, you can't do anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's doing like the super weird--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do simple things, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone who has those gloves can now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can punch people with lightning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ranged punching. It gives me a plus one to my unarmored attack and damage rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not, I don't have it prepared. I have to go to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I've got Stoneshape, still, so if we want to seal the room and sleep on the other side of the room, maybe for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can do the dome and nothing can harm us in the dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we put the thing in a lead box? Don't we have a lead box?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it small enough to fit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll fit in the box you had made, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to not touch it, but I'm going to shove the box around it, and close it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The like warm glow of orange flares a bit as it gets bumped, but it seems fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the box does not go in the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up there next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a rough fight, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some bad rolls for you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these a Matt Mercer creation, or are these a D&D thing where we can find them in D&D Beyond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were a creation of mine, but I put them in D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go fly to Seattle tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go pack tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was the live watch along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, all you guys that are watching up at Emerald City Comic Con.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can't still be there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll also be exhausted. See you Saturday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The game was almost entirely combat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this was a huge fight.
